resources.string: GeoQuizNav

The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.

The Amazon River is the longest river in the world.
The Great Wall of China cannot be seen from space with the naked eye
Antarctica is the driest continent on Earth.
The Sahara Desert is the largest hot desert in the world.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.
The equator passes through several countries in Africa.
Russia spans two continents, Europe and Asia.
The United States has the largest number of time zones in the world.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest ocean on Earth
The Dead Sea is actually a saltwater lake, not a sea.
The United Kingdom includes the countries of England, Scotland, and Wales, but not Northern Ireland.
The country of Chile has a coastline along the Pacific Ocean but not the Atlantic Ocean.
